title: Flower Fairies of the Wayside
description: First published in the 1920s, the "Flower Fairy" books by Cicely Mary Barker have delighted generations of children with their exquisite illustrations and engaging poems. In "Flower Fairies of the Wayside" we meet no less than nineteen fairies, who encourage us to look at nature and learn to appreciate the true beauty and wonder of the 'ordinary' world around us.
author: Cicely Mary Barker
